sentences: Franco Gabelli better known by his stage name Frank Michael is a Belgian singer of Italian origin born in Parma, Italy on 7 May 1947.
At age of three, Franco's family left Italy and resided in Seraing, province of Li√®ge, Belgium.
His singing career was launched with the 1974 single "Je ne peux vivre sans toi" released on RCA.
He was popular in  live concerts and released a big number of albums that charted in France and Belgium.
In 2003, he also released a homage album entitled Thank You Elvis with 15 tracks of Elvis Presley in French and Italian.
